casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Ward, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Ward (1996), 75 Ohio St.3d 562.]

(No. 96-238 Submitted April 15, 1996 Decided June 5, 1996.) *563Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Philip R. Cummings, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Fredrick E. Ward, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in that court’s entry.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
